title: Marrakech to Zagora
description: Depart Marrakech crossing the High Atlas via Tizi n'Tichka pass (2260m). Stop at Ait Benhaddou, the ancient caravan route fortress. Continue through Ouarzazate and the Draa Valley—Morocco's longest river lined with palm groves. Arrive Zagora for sunset camel trek into the dunes.

title: Zagora to Marrakech
description: Wake for sunrise over the desert. After breakfast, return through the Draa Valley with stops at Berber villages. Cross back over the Atlas arriving Marrakech evening.

title: Marrakech to Dades Valley
description: Cross the High Atlas via Tizi n'Tichka pass. Visit Ait Benhaddou—the UNESCO fortress from Gladiator and Game of Thrones. Continue through Ouarzazate along the Road of a Thousand Kasbahs to the dramatic Dades Valley.

title: Dades to Merzouga
description: Morning walk in Dades Gorge among finger-like rock formations. Drive through Tinghir to Todra Gorge—300m canyon walls just 10m apart. Continue to Merzouga for sunset camel trek into Erg Chebbi. Dinner and night under the stars.

title: Merzouga to Marrakech
description: Optional sunrise over the dunes. After breakfast, the long scenic drive back through Rissani, over the Atlas. Arrive Marrakech evening.

title: Marrakech to Dades Valley
description: Cross the High Atlas via Tizi n'Tichka. Visit Ait Benhaddou and Ouarzazate. Continue to Dades Valley for sunset.

title: Dades to Merzouga
description: Dades Gorge morning walk. Todra Gorge. Arrive Merzouga for sunset camel trek and desert camp.

title: Merzouga to Fes
description: Sunrise over the dunes. Drive north through the Ziz Valley—green palms through red canyon walls. Cedar forests with Barbary macaques. Ifrane. Arrive Fes evening.

title: Marrakech to Dades Valley
description: Atlas crossing via Tizi n'Tichka. Ait Benhaddou. Ouarzazate. Dades Valley sunset.

title: Dades to Merzouga
description: Dades Gorge walk. Todra Gorge. Arrive Merzouga. Sunset camel trek. Desert camp.

title: Merzouga
description: Full day exploring the desert. Options: 4x4 to nomad families, sandboarding, Khamlia village for Gnawa music. Second night desert area.

title: Merzouga to Marrakech
description: Sunrise. Scenic return through Todra Gorge and over the Atlas. Arrive Marrakech evening.

title: Marrakech to Dades
description: Atlas crossing. Ait Benhaddou. Ouarzazate. Dades Valley.

title: Dades to Merzouga
description: Dades Gorge. Todra Gorge. Merzouga. Camel trek. Desert camp.

title: Merzouga to Midelt
description: Morning desert. Ziz Valley. Fossils at Erfoud. Midelt at foot of Middle Atlas.

title: Midelt to Fes
description: Cedar forests. Barbary macaques at Azrou. Ifrane. Arrive Fes.

title: Marrakech to Dades
description: Atlas crossing. Ait Benhaddou. Dades Valley overnight.

title: Dades to Merzouga
description: Todra Gorge. Sahara sunset. Desert camp.

title: Merzouga to Fes
description: Ziz Valley. Cedar forests. Arrive Fes evening.

title: Fes
description: Full day in the world's largest car-free medina. Tanneries, madrasas, craftsmen. Optional cooking class.

title: Fes to Marrakech
description: Drive across Middle Atlas via Beni Mellal. Arrive Marrakech evening.

title: Marrakech to Dades
description: Atlas crossing. Ait Benhaddou. Dades Valley.

title: Dades to Merzouga
description: Todra Gorge. Merzouga. Desert camp.

title: Merzouga to Fes
description: Ziz Valley. Cedar forests. Fes.

title: Fes
description: Fes medina with local guide. Tanneries, souks, historic sites.

title: Fes to Chefchaouen
description: Through the Rif Mountains to the blue city.

title: Chefchaouen to Rabat
description: Morning wandering blue streets. Afternoon drive to Rabat.

title: Rabat to Marrakech
description: Hassan Tower. Kasbah Udayas. Optional Casablanca stop for Hassan II Mosque. Continue to Marrakech.

title: Marrakech
description: Bahia Palace. Souks. Jemaa el-Fna square. End of tour.

title: Marrakech to Ouarzazate
description: Tizi n'Tichka pass. Ait Benhaddou guided tour. Ouarzazate overnight.

title: Ouarzazate to Merzouga
description: Dades Valley. Todra Gorge. Arrive Merzouga for sunset camel trek.

title: Merzouga
description: Full desert day. Nomad visit. Khamlia village. Second desert night.

title: Merzouga to Fes
description: Ziz Valley. Ifrane. Cedar forests. Fes.

title: Fes
description: Full day Fes medina immersion. Tanneries, madrasas, traditional crafts.

description: Volubilis Roman ruins. Moulay Idriss holy town. Meknes exploration.

title: Meknes to Chefchaouen

title: Rabat to Fes

title: Fes to Merzouga
description: Drive south through Ifrane, cedar forests with monkeys, dramatic Ziz Valley. Arrive Merzouga for sunset camel trek. Desert camp.

title: Merzouga to Fes
description: Sunrise over dunes. Return north via Erfoud and scenic mountain route. Fes evening.
